description: Generates questions for a submission by utilizing existing survey sections.
label: Create Submission Questions

options.name: submissionToken
options.label: Submission token
options.info: The Submission token for which you want to create the sections

options.name: sections
options.label: Sections
options.info: The sections created in the previous step

options.name: log
options.label: Log this action
options.info: The log of the creation of the submission in the application logs

options.name: result
options.label: Result
options.info: Pass this variable that this creates onto the next step
